price: (99) Then, did they feel secure from the plan of Allāh? But no one feels secure from the plan of Allāh except the losing people.
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُواْ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَلَا يَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū makra al-lahi falā yamanu makra al-lahi illā al-qawmu al-khāsirūna
